headline: Floridas altered social-media law is still flawed | Commentary
author: Julio Fuentes
sentences: Inserted into Floridas recent special session to address congressional redistricting was an unrelated measure  Florida Senate Bill 6-C (SB 6-C), which repeals a carveout tucked into Florida Senate Bill 7072 (SB 7072), a law passed last year to crack down on tech companies content-moderation techniques.
Ron DeSantis and Disneys public disagreements on state policy are bringing up important discussions regarding Floridas currently struck down content-moderation law.
